nodes.text: The Rivoche Ranges were a chain of mountains on Eriadu, a planet in the Outer Rim Territories.

The Rivoche Ranges were first mentioned in the 2017 young adult novel Leia, Princess of Alderaan, by author Claudia Gray. The Rivoche Ranges share their name with the Star Wars Legends character Rivoche Tarkin, who was from Eriadu.
